resources.string: Portal SDK consists of multiple feature components that enable you to integrate Portal specific features into your App.

Portal Calling offers standard implementations for various VC functionalities and scalable solutions to enrich VC apps with Portal experiences. It assists in areas ranging from Android telephony service integration, to device states handling, to consistent Portal Call Control UX across the platform.

Portal Calling offers standard implementations for various VC functionalities and scalable solutions to enrich VC apps with Portal experiences. It assists in areas ranging from Android telephony service integration, to device states handling, to consistent Portal Call Control UX across the platform.
FBNS SDK enables you to integrate with Meta \'s Push Notification Service.

Portal Calling offers standard implementations for various VC functionalities and scalable solutions to enrich VC apps with Portal experiences. It assists in areas ranging from Android telephony service integration, to device states handling, to consistent Portal Call Control UX across the platform.

Portal Calling offers standard implementations for various VC functionalities and scalable solutions to enrich VC apps with Portal experiences. It assists in areas ranging from Android telephony service integration, to device states handling, to consistent Portal Call Control UX across the platform.

Smart Camera Editor abstracts the complexity of integrating Smart Camera Controls into your Application. You can invoke the Smart Camera Editor from you Camera based App to enable users to change Camera modes
Smart Camera SDK enables you to integrate with Portal\'s Smart Camera implementation. \n \nYour Camera based Apps can access different Smart Camera modes of Portal Smart Camera using Smart Camera SDK
Privacy State SDK enables you to integrate with Privacy specific feaures such as accessing Camera Shutter and Privacy button states of the Portal Device
Meta is committed to building experiences that everyone can use, which includes people with disabilities along with the tools and technology they rely on.
